member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFIDReader
member.summary: An RFIDReader module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFIDReader.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFIDReader.IdReceived
member.summary: Raised when the module receives an id.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFIDReader.MalformedIdReceived
member.summary: Raised when the module receives an id with an incorrect checksum.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFIDReader.IdReceivedEventHandler
member.summary: The delegate that is used to handle the id received event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFIDReader.MalformedIdReceivedEventHandler
